item.title: Hello my name Is Chatgpt!
item.description: Technology is something that is constantly evolving. When you take a look at Gartner’s hypecycle you can see a curve that shows you which technologies are coming our way. You will see a couple of different topics regarding AI, and that’s where todays post is talking about. A big name in this artificial intelligence space is OpenAI thanks to it’s 2 big projects that you can recognize by the names of:
